General.Name: Asia Pacific Investama Tbk PT
General.Description: PT Asia Pacific Investama Tbk, through its subsidiaries, operates as a textile and garments company in Indonesia. It operates through four segments: Garments, Weaving, Spinning, and Knitting. The company offers yarn, greige fabrics, denim fabrics, knitted fabric, and apparel. It also engages in the laundry and export businesses. The company was formerly known as PT Apac Citra Centertex Tbk and changed its name to PT Asia Pacific Investama Tbk in November 2015. The company was incorporated in 1987 and is headquartered in Tangerang, Indonesia. PT Asia Pacific Investama Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Indah Jaya Investama.
